items.question: What is Nextmotion?
items.answer: Nextmotion is an all-in-one platform designed to digitize and centralize the management of your aesthetic clinic: patient files, schedule, communication, billing, marketing and photo tools.

items.question: Who is the solution for?
items.answer: Nextmotion is intended for aesthetic medicine, aesthetic surgery, dermatology and anti-aging medicine clinics and practices that want to modernize their practice.

items.question: What are the main features?
items.answer: Patient management, online appointment booking, automated communication (emails, SMS, WhatsApp), CRM, billing, photo tools, conversational AI, dashboard and statistics.

items.question: Is it compatible with Doctolib?
items.answer: Yes, Nextmotion can synchronize with Doctolib and other calendars to avoid double entries.

items.question: Is patient data secure?
items.answer: Yes. All data is hosted in France and compliant with GDPR and the HDS (Health Data Hosting) framework.

concept.title: Absolute precision for medical imaging
concept.subtitle: A new era for before-and-after visualization.
concept.text: Nextmotion Revolution is a robotic arm controlled by your iPhone that rotates around the patient at a constant speed. It captures every angle, every expression and every emotion to produce dynamic videos that can be analyzed from any viewpoint.

item1.title: Total standardization
item1.desc: Recreate the exact same video sequence months later using saved parameters.

item2.title: Smart robotic arm
item2.desc: Smooth 180° or 360° rotation with precise stops at pre-defined positions.

item3.title: Calibrated lighting
item3.desc: Dual LED panels on battery ensure constant and shadow-free lighting.

item4.title: Dynamic captures
item4.desc: Record facial expressions and emotions for authentic and natural results.

item5.title: Portable & autonomous
item5.desc: Lightweight, battery-powered and transportable in a compact case.

workflow.title: How it works
workflow.step1: 1️⃣ Connect your iPhone to the device via Bluetooth using the Nextmotion Capture app.
workflow.step2: 2️⃣ Calibrate camera position, lighting and patient alignment in seconds.
workflow.step3: 3️⃣ Record the 'before' video following facial expression cues on screen.
workflow.step4: 4️⃣ Recreate the 'after' video automatically using the ghost image and stored parameters.

value.title: Dynamic videos. Irrefutable proof.
value.subtitle: Emotion, transparency and credibility in every frame.
value.text: A video is worth a thousand pictures. It shows movement, emotion and natural results — no Photoshop, no filters. Patients trust what they see, colleagues respect your precision, and your results speak for themselves.

intro.paragraph: Since its creation in 2015, Nextmotion has become the most innovative technology company in aesthetic medicine. Present in over 30 countries, our mission is to provide practitioners with intuitive, secure and connected tools to digitize every step of the patient journey — from consultation to loyalty.

years.desc: Launch of the first NextMotion (Face & Body) and filing of two international patents.
